item.description:
NHC member Marc is turning a year older this Thursday. He'd like to invite everyone to come out and celebrate with him at Geronimo!

More information may be added later, but for now that's the important details. Rumor has it another collective member will also have a birthday come midnight, so come join in the fun! Ty's birthday is the 21st, so we will be celebrating his too!

Geronimo is a Tequilla bar on Crown Street, where we have had many a happy hour and great food.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Marc, if you hadn't met before you should find a picture of him in the "Yes" area of the event post.
item.name: Come Celebrate Marc's Birthday!
